title: Jenkins and Jonez Show - Paul Pierce Is ‘The Truth’ But He’s Lying About The Poop
itunes:title: Jenkins and Jonez Show - Paul Pierce Is ‘The Truth’ But He’s Lying About The Poop
description:
The guys discuss the tragedy of Young Dolph’s death (1:00), the Terence Crawford vs. Shawn Porter fight (15:00), why Paul Pierce is lying about the infamous pooping his pants situation (23:30), and John has to issue an apology (33:30).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
